description: Ideal for picking up the pace on fast, rolling terrain, the SENSE PRO 4 draws on road-running standards for a dynamic ride and just the right amount of protection. To give you extra grip and stability, this PRO level SENSE shoe is packed with trail-specific features like a hydrophobic upper and Contagrip® specific compound for premium traction.
name: Salomon Sense 4 /Pro - Mens
